settings.title: Settings

forms.jobHazardAnalysisDescription: This form tracks all potential job hazards on the worksite. To be completed by all employees.
forms.startOfDayReportDescription: This form ensures all crewmen enter the worksite in healthy condition. To be completed by all employees.
forms.endOfDayReportDescription: This form captures the general health of the crewmen leaving the job site. To be completed by all employees.
forms.incidentReportDescription: This form documents incidents and safety compliance. To be completed when necessary.
forms.quickIncidentReportDescription: This form provides a quick way to report incidents with basic information. To be completed when necessary.
forms.noFormsAvailable: No forms are currently available. Please contact your administrator.
forms.instructions: Instructions: Please complete the safety checklist below.
forms.adminOnlySection: This section is only for admin use when editing forms
forms.wereThereWitnesses: Were there witnesses to the incident?
forms.witnessNamesAndContact: Enter the witnesses' names and contact information

placeholders.jobNamePlaceholder: Name or title of the job

safety.workHazardDescription: Are the following hazards present on your Job site?

safety.allFormsCompleted: All safety forms completed for today. Great job staying compliant!
safety.pendingFormsReminder: Please complete the pending safety forms below to ensure workplace compliance.
safety.noFormsEnabled: No safety forms are currently enabled for your company. Please contact your administrator.
safety.dailyComplianceReminder: All safety forms must be completed daily to ensure workplace safety compliance and regulatory requirements.

common.timeSpentValidNumber: Time spent must be a valid positive number

safetyQuestions.ladderAltered: Has the ladder been altered in any way?
safetyQuestions.weatherCompromised: Is the ladder compromised by weather conditions?
safetyQuestions.housekeeping: Is housekeeping adequate around the ladder area?
safetyQuestions.rungsClean: Are ladder rungs clean and free of slippery materials?
safetyQuestions.feetPositioned: Are your feet positioned properly on the rungs?
safetyQuestions.livePowerPrecautions: Have you taken precautions around live power?
safetyQuestions.stableSurface: Is the ladder on a stable surface?
safetyQuestions.facingLadder: Are you facing the ladder when climbing?
safetyQuestions.ropePulleyCondition: Rope and pulley in good condition?
safetyQuestions.extendedHeight: Extended no more than 3 feet above support?
safetyQuestions.height: Height of ladder is adequate for the job?
safetyQuestions.warmUpStretch: Did you warm up and stretch before starting work?
safetyQuestions.lockoutTagout: Is lockout/tagout required for this job?
safetyQuestions.energizedWorkPermit: Do you have an energized work permit if required?
safetyQuestions.emergencyPlan: Is there an emergency action plan for this job?
safetyQuestions.emergencyPlanReviewed: Has the emergency action plan been reviewed?
safetyQuestions.fireExtinguisher: Is a fire extinguisher readily available?
safetyQuestions.firstAidKit: Is a first aid kit readily available?
safetyQuestions.powerToolsGFCI: Power Tools, GFCI and extension cords in good working condition
safetyQuestions.usingLadderToday: Will you be using a ladder today
safetyQuestions.ladderTypeQuestion: What type of ladder are you using
safetyQuestions.completedSafetyChecks: Have you completed the following safety precaution checks
safetyQuestions.signaturePrompt: Please sign below to confirm the accuracy of this analysis
safetyQuestions.signatureRequired: Signature is required to submit the form

incidentReport.narrativeReportDescription: In a narrative report of the Accident/Incident, please identify the actions leading to or contributing to the accident/incident and the actions following the accident/incident.
incidentReport.estimatedDaysAway: Estimated Number of Days Away from Job
incidentReport.unsafeConditions: Unsafe mechanical/physical/environmental condition at time of accident/incident (Be specific)
incidentReport.personalFactors: Personal factors (Attitude, knowledge or skill, reaction time, fatigue, hobbies)
incidentReport.levelOfPPERequired: Level of personal protection equipment required in Site Safety Plan (if applicable)
incidentReport.howEquipmentUseDiffered: If not, how did actual equipment use differ from plan?
